name: Blockworks Daily
title: Utf8b8jfqg Crypto Confidence Scams Lead To Financial
text:
Synopsis
Crypto confidence scams, particularly "pig butchering" schemes, have evolved into a sophisticated, industrialized fraud operation primarily using cryptocurrency, with tens of billions of dollars extracted from victims through manipulative social engineering tactics.

Key Insights
- Pig butchering scams have extracted tens of billions of dollars from victims, mostly in the US, through romance and investment cons
- Scammers often operate from forced labor camps in Myanmar, using social media to groom victims
- Cryptocurrency, particularly USDT, is the preferred medium for these scams due to fast, irreversible transactions
- Tether has only managed to freeze approximately 0.5% of funds sent to blacklisted addresses
- The scam typically involves creating fake trading platforms that show fabricated profits to encourage continued investment
- Law enforcement struggles to keep up with the speed of crypto transactions and money laundering techniques
- The crypto industry faces pressure to either combat these crimes more effectively or demonstrate greater societal utility
